title: Road House (1989) 1080p Rifftrax 6ch 2ch
description:

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS RIFFTRAX
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK3 FOR 2.0

Road House (1989)
video: 1920x820 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AC3 2.0
audio2: just movie AAC 5.1
audio3: just movie AAC 2.0
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
intro: in separate mp3 file since there's no room in the video for it
Rifftrax released 2006.07.21 1hour54min22sec 2,280,316,872bytes

This is a repackaged release of an excellent anonymous remastering job of the Rifftrax that started it all: Road House! The 1080p video looks great and the riffs are clear but aren't too loud. Please leave any feedback regarding this repackaged release.

A very special thanks to the anonymous author of the remastered rifftrax who also did the initial muxing with the high definition video and provided the intro mp3. And as always, big thanks to the posters of the original 1080p/5.1 encode of the movie, the subs and the chapters.

If these Rifftrax were enjoyable, you haven't paid for them and you have a few dollars to spare, please consider purchasing these riffs (3.99USD) or make a general donation (5USD and up) - they take Bitcoin now too
